description:
For hot-weather hiking, the Singi Trekking Shirt is a welcome layer for venting and sun protection. The technical fabric wicks sweat, promotes air circulation and feels cool against your skin. Button-up tabs keep the sleeves rolled up should the occasion warrant it.

  • Hard-wearing G-1000® fabric blends organic cotton with recycled polyester
  • Mesh under the arms and opening in the yoke offers comfort during warm weather hikes
  • 2 chest pockets and 1 small sleeve pocket for essentials
  • Sleeve buttons keep rolled up sleeves in place
  • Regular fit offers no surprises, just comfort
name: Fjallraven Singi Trekking Long Sleeve Shirt - Men's
